QuestData.Title: The Menders' Stead
QuestData.Description: It's likely that the battle for Andorhal will start up again soon. In the meantime, you could probably stand to practice your skills as a $c.$b$bEast of here is a large farm that has been taken over by the Argent Dawn and the Cenarion Circle. I don't doubt that they'll have some work for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
